author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds information on inactive sources to the XrdAdaptor exception messages that include information on active and disabled sources. Information on inactive sources could be useful to investigate the logs of situations such as https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43162

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1237

#### PR validation:

Code compiles

To be backported to 15_0_X
title: XrdAdaptor: improve exception messages
